nodes.bodyText: Better to rename the method to something like appendTenantDomainQueryParam or something along the line.
Is asserting the status enough to gurantee a successful logout?

After a successful logout, an empty response will be redirected to the client's reply URL. Then an authentication request will be sent by the client. So we can't test any content. So have added the logic to verify the existence of sessionDataKey in the response

I feel it would be better to include what we expected to happen here.
"Authentication request was not initiated after logout from sample. Possible logout failure."
In addition to the current message.
